com.example.federico.wearableui.viewport.drawable_content

Interface IDrawableContent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICursor, IDrawableBitmap, IDrawableCircle, IDrawableLine, IDrawableRectangle, IDrawableText
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cursor, DrawableBitmap, DrawableCircle, DrawableContent, DrawableLine, DrawablePoint, DrawableRectangle, DrawableText

    public interface IDrawableContent
    Interface that defines the behaviour of a DrawableContent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawOnCanvas(Canvas canvas)
      Draws the DrawableContent onto the given canvas.
      void drawOnContinuousCanvas(Canvas canvas)
      Draws the drawable content onto the given canvas, as if such canvas was a continuous canvas.
      boolean fireEvent()
      Programmatically fires an event involving the DrawableContent that calls it.
      Viewport getContainer()
      Returns the Viewport that contains this DrawableContent.
      Paint getPaint()
      Returns the Paint used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
      Point getViewportCoordinates()
      Returns the coordinates of this DrawableContent expressed in the Viewport coordinate system.
      DrawableContent.Visibility getVisibility()
      Returns the DrawableContent.Visibility of this DrawableContent.
      boolean isInBounds(Point point)
      Checks if the Point is contained in the bounds of this DrawableContent.
      void moveTo(Point point)
      Moves this DrawableContent over to the specified Point.
      void setAlpha(int alpha)
      Sets the alpha used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
      void setColor(int color)
      Sets the color used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
      void setEventListener(EventListener listener)
      Sets the passed EventListener for this DrawableContent.
      void setFill(boolean fill)
      Sets the fill property of the Paint used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
      void setVisibility(DrawableContent.Visibility visibility)
      Sets the DrawableContent.Visibility of this DrawableContent.

    • Method Detail

      • drawOnCanvas

        void drawOnCanvas(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the DrawableContent onto the given canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the Canvas onto which the DrawableContent will drawn itself.

      • drawOnContinuousCanvas

        void drawOnContinuousCanvas(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the drawable content onto the given canvas, as if such canvas was a continuous canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the Canvas onto which the DrawableContent will drawn itself.

      • isInBounds

        boolean isInBounds(Point point)
        Checks if the Point is contained in the bounds of this DrawableContent. Be aware that hte point has to be expressed in the Viewport coordinate system and not in the Android coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Point is inside the bounds of this DrawableContent, false otherwise.

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(Point point)
        Moves this DrawableContent over to the specified Point. Be aware that the point has to be relative to the Viewport coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        point - the Point where the DrawableContent has to be moved.

      • fireEvent

        boolean fireEvent()
        Programmatically fires an event involving the DrawableContent that calls it. If a EventListener is set for this DrawableContent, it will be notified.
        Returns:
        true if the event has been handled by a EventListener, false otherwise.

      • getPaint

        Paint getPaint()
        Returns the Paint used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
        Returns:
        the Paint used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.

      • getViewportCoordinates

        Point getViewportCoordinates()
        Returns the coordinates of this DrawableContent expressed in the Viewport coordinate system.
        Returns:
        a Point representing the coordinates of this DrawableContent expressed in the Viewport coordinate system.

      • getContainer

        Viewport getContainer()
        Returns the Viewport that contains this DrawableContent.
        Returns:
        the Viewport that contains this DrawableContent.

      • getVisibility

        DrawableContent.Visibility getVisibility()
        Returns the DrawableContent.Visibility of this DrawableContent.
        Returns:
        the Visibility of this DrawableContent.

      • setEventListener

        void setEventListener(EventListener listener)
        Sets the passed EventListener for this DrawableContent.
        Parameters:
        listener - an EventListener for this DrawableContent.

      • setColor

        void setColor(int color)
        Sets the color used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
        Parameters:
        color - an int representing a color.

      • setAlpha

        void setAlpha(int alpha)
        Sets the alpha used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
        Parameters:
        alpha - an int expressing the alpha (from 0 to 255).

      • setFill

        void setFill(boolean fill)
        Sets the fill property of the Paint used by this DrawableContent to draw itself.
        Parameters:
        fill - true for a filling Paint, false for a stroke style Paint.

      • setVisibility

        void setVisibility(DrawableContent.Visibility visibility)
        Sets the DrawableContent.Visibility of this DrawableContent.
        Parameters:
        visibility - the Visibility of this DrawableContent.
